description:
The News10 app is a must-have mobile app for those living, working and enjoying all that Jefferson State has to offer. Stay connected wherever you go with the official companion to KTVL News10, the broadcast news leader for Southern Oregon and Northern California. Access local news stories plus sports, weather, entertainment, videos and much more. Simple design helps you find content quickly and easily. Customize your news and favorites with “My News.” Save stories for reading at your convenience. Share content through E-Mail, Facebook and Twitter. If you like our App, spread the word to friends on Facebook and Twitter.
The News10 app is an ad-supported application.
